it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Interface Client

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMIClient, SocketClient

    public interface Client
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Client's connection to the socket

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • chooseAction

        Action chooseAction(java.util.List<Action> available,
                    boolean mustChoose)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Asks the user to choose between a set of actions he can use
        Parameters:
        available - List of available actions
        mustChoose - If false, the user can choose not to choose. In this case the function returns null
        Returns:
        Chosen action
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - If something goes wrong with the connection

                              boolean mustChoose)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Asks the user which unloaded weapons located in his hand he wants to reload
        Parameters:
        reloadable - Weapons that are currently not loaded
        mustChoose - If false, the user can choose not to choose. In this case the function returns null
        Returns:
        Weapons to be reloaded
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - If something goes wrong with the connection

      • movePlayer

        Point movePlayer(java.util.List<Point> destinations,
                 boolean mustChoose)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Asks the user where he wants to movePlayer
        Parameters:
        destinations - Possible destinations for the user
        mustChoose - If false, the user can choose not to choose. In this case the function returns null
        Returns:
        Point where the player will be when he's done moving
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - If something goes wrong with the connection

        Parameters:
